```{r, setup}
library("treelapse")
library("phyloseq")
data(GlobalPatterns)

GPr <- transform_sample_counts(GlobalPatterns, function(x) x / sum(x) )
GPfr <- filter_taxa(GPr, function(x) mean(x) > 1e-3, TRUE)
taxa <- taxa_edgelist(tax_table(GPfr))

values <- tree_sum(
  data.frame(taxa),
  log(1 + apply(otu_table(GPfr)@.Data, 1, mean))
)

values <- data.frame(
  unit = names(values),
  value = values,
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

doi_tree(values, taxa, "Bacteria", "Bacteria", width = 2000, height = 1000)
```
